params.__interestRate: The initial interest rate for the contract.
params._authority: The address of the AccessControl authority for managing permissions.

returns._0: The current interest rate as a uint.

isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

setAuthority(address).details: Transfers control to a new authority. The caller must be the current authority.

setInterestRate(uint256).details: This function is restricted to users with the necessary permissions.

params.__interestRate: The new interest rate to be set.

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the contract with a constant interest rate and authority.

interestRate().notice: Returns the current interest rate of the contract.

setInterestRate(uint256).notice: Allows authorized users to update the interest rate.
